Thank you for your kind comments and thumbs ups on my other torrents, your feedback is welcome.


About the Series:
The first series of six episodes comprises two three-part dramatizations of the first two Thorne novels 
respectively. 
In the first, Sleepyhead, Thorne has to track down and stop a serial killer who aims to leave his 
victims alive but unable to communicate because of locked-in syndrome. 
The second is ScaredyCat, which features two serial killers apparently working in tandem.


I hope you enjoy.
